phrases: At that moment, I heard a terrible noise.
I heard something snapping inside me.
No matter how much I want to catch up, it is still not enough.
I felt like my heart was being ripped in two.
Even if we give it everything we have, it is pointless.
The only thing I could do to protect myself...
was to take my pain out on someone else.
There was nothing we could do!
I did not want to say those things,
Maybe that is who I am.
The graduation ceremony really is happening today.
I will come after I have something to eat.
She will not have time for breakfast otherwise.
Food is the source of our power!
That is why we have got to keep it together.
Of course you are not, huh?
Thanks to you, I feel a lot better.
Try not to remember how I looked when I was crying.
I do not like you when you call girls ugly.
I wish I could forget about what happened yesterday...
I wish I could relive yesterday.
Sorry... I have got to wake Shiina.
Shiina, I am opening the door.
Hall is being torn down because of Shiina.
Why did not you stop her?
I asked her if she talked it over with you.
When she first arrived at Sakura Hall,
she would not have cared how you felt.
Thanks to you all, Mashiro has changed...
Even if it is for the worse in this situation.
Her GPS says she is at school.
29th Suimei University of the Arts High School Graduation Ceremony
famous painters throughout history could have painted this.
This painting is the love Mashiro feels for Sakura Hall.
Why are you the only one missing?
But that is why I understood...
when she said those words that day.
Mashiro-chan planned to protect Sakura Hall...
by leaving if we failed to get enough signatures.
This is not the Sakura Hall I love!
What kind of goodbye is this?
There is no point if it ends like this!
In that case, Sorata, you will have to tell her that.
it is unlikely she is returned to England on her own.
Has she ever even ridden a train by herself?
Let us check out places in the area Mashiro might visit.
search the school and the surrounding area.
Make sure you are back for the graduation ceremony.
I am determined to get you to give me the most magnificent send-off!
Let us look for her, too.
I guess I will search around Sakura Hall just in case, then.
Kanda-kun, you take the area from the shopping mall to the station.
I will check the area around the convenience store.
Call me if you find Mashiro.
what I had to say once I got the results of my audition...
I have always been grateful I got to meet you.
I have been able to work so hard up to now because you were there.
Looking at your face gave me energy.
Hearing your voice made me optimistic.
Before I knew it, I was always watching you.
Hearing you compliment my clothes and hair made my feelings soar.
The days we talked a lot...
made me feel like I could try that much harder.
Thank you for giving me the will to work so hard!
You should tell Mashiro how you feel!
The reason I have been able to work so hard until today...
is because I am in love with you, Kanda-kun.
Did the girl who always buys these come in today?
Why am I doing this, anyway?
Send an email to the former freeloader.
Shiina felt responsible for Sakura Hall being torn down and ran off.
Do you have any idea where she might have gone?
It is only natural for me to be suspicious...
since this is not an international call.
Want to touch me and find out?
That is no way to treat someone who was worried about you.
Is not there something you would like to say to me?
When you emailed me saying you wanted to do...
I like how you cannot admit your feelings.
How can you be so sure?
Mashiro does not give up so easily...
on something once she is decided she wants it.
she is actually the world's most selfish and stubborn sore loser.
Someone already came asking me to subscribe to the paper.
You should not act so immaturely in front of children.
I came to apologize for that.
I feel badly about what I did to Kanda-kun.
No one told me another team was trying to hire Shiina-san.
is not doing something about it your job?
There is nothing I can say.
And your habit of ignoring everything you do not want to hear...
I heard they were going to tear Sakura Hall down.
Is there anything I can do to help?
Even if there were, we do not need your help.
They will do something about it themselves.
I even checked around the college, but...
Let us go look outside the school.
They left us at school so we would not...
be late to our graduation ceremony.
Let us trust them with this.
Besides, there is something we have to do.
You two always get along so well.
Not as well as you two, who we always see together.
It is a love letter from me.
You are not going to look at it?
If you are serious, there is no need to read it.
Hau-hau, your boyfriend is so cool.
Just as we planned, Mr. Former Student Council President.
If you are really sorry, do not get me involved.
I am looking forward to your video, Hau-hau.
She was heading towards the station about ten minutes ago.
I do not know what is going on, but you can do it!
I always thought it was kind of boring...
that every day was the same.
I pretended it was someone else's fault that nothing happened.
But when I met Mashiro that fall, I realized...
that if you put your mind to it,
you can change the color of the world in an instant.
What color do you want to be?
Hall will be torn down if I stay.
but we did not fill the whole notebook.
I worked hard, but Sakura Hall will be torn down...
I do not want to stay at Sakura Hall if it will make you hate me.
I think what I said yesterday was how I really feel.
I would been thinking it for a long time now.
I was jealous of you because you had everything I wanted.
I wondered, why is it always you?
I almost thought I hated you sometimes.
Because of you, I was able to find my own goal!
I worked hard, but I failed and was disappointed.
But all of that made for the greatest of days!
If I had not met you, I never would have known these feelings!
That is why I love you for teaching me all of these things!
I want to be with you.
I want to stay at Sakura Hall.
But if I stay, Sakura Hall will be torn down.
I will because everyone else trouble, and I will hurt you.
I made Nanami endure so much after the audition.
I do not want to stay at Sakura Hall if it will hurt someone.
Do not act like my frustration is your own.
Failing the audition is my own problem.
and pretending I was fine were my own decisions.
You should not feel responsible for me.
You do not have to be so harsh...
Do I look like I am not mad?
I am really happy you were worried about me.
So I will not let you just leave.
But it is my fault Sakura Hall is going to be torn down.
I do not want to go, but I have to.
We told you, you do not have to go.
I have never felt like this before.
Kanda-kun, if there is anything you want to say, you can tell her.
Just because she is crying, she is not going to break.
You are powerless against Mashiro's tears, are not you?
You do not understand Sakura Hall at all.
The Sakura Hall I am talking about is not that rundown building.
It is Sakura Hall because Misaki-senpai and Jin-san,
Aoyama and Chihiro-sensei, Akasaka and you are there.
It is Sakura Hall because everyone is there.
In any case, what I am trying to say is
I will always stay at Sakura Hall.
You said I made you happy.
but you should probably head to school soon.
I do not want to go!
I still do not know what color I want to be,
but today is a specific color.
Even if today's the last day we are all together,
I want the graduation ceremony to be the color of cherry blossoms.
I love the color of cherry blossoms.
Laughing with everyone at the culture festival!
Running at the pool with everyone at night!
I do not want to graduate!
